column5: I managed to get out today and to my surprise the river was fishable.  When I started the visibility was about 8" and when I left it started to clear and turn "green".  Too bad I ran out of bait. I only took the one pic. Thanks
Good job man!  That's a super clean fish.
Hope DAVEY dont see that pic..  Real nice.
Nice man.  Beauty fish! Im going to try and find some good water this weekend myself.  This is inspirational! lol
My first thought, too. That thing is in mint condition.
Um, call me tomorrow AM     LOL, nice fish and great combo!
Yes nice combo..... Now I know why they're called knuckbusters. lol.  As soon as I set the hook she ran 20-30 yrds.

AH HAHAHAHA.  your reports are making me miss it already     save me some would ya, we can sit out back and have a beer (or 8) and fire up my smoker for one of those nice cromers...      yeah, like I'll teach you something about cooking...
Great looking fish , with all the rain I am surprised that you found a river to fish.
Geoff, i will bring you some.  She was a little big for my liking, and the others were too small. We can have a friendly smoke off!  Bring your best recipe.
Oh GAME ON Peter!  i just need the side of meet (to be smoked) 24 hours in advance so I can let it sit in the brine. PS, the wood is apple and black cherry...
Sweet, beautiful chrome! Thanks for sharing  p.-
